text:
[Verse]
Midnight sky so bright
Stars dancing in the light
We got nowhere to be
Just you and me

[Verse]
Hearts beating like drums
Feel the rhythm till it hums
Lost in the stardust bloom
Dancin' with the moon

[Chorus]
Round and round we go
Feet barely touch the floor
In this cosmic show
We live forevermore

[Verse]
Night whispers your name
Every moment feels the same
In the galaxy we roam
This place we call home

[Bridge]
Hold on to the glow
In the night we'll flow
With each twirl and spin
A new dance begin

[Chorus]
Round and round we go
Feet barely touch the floor
In this cosmic show
We live forevermore
title: Dancin' with the Moon
